title: work2019
author: work2019
content: hello . good morning . i need help in blockchain wallet . anybody can help me ? thanks . good bye

comments.author: Welsh
comments.body: Yeah, but we're going to need some information from you first. Ask your question, and there's plenty of knowledgable users here that will be able to help. Try to include as much information as possible, but without revealing any sensitive data. Also, beware of receiving personal messages on the forum, trying to help you in disguise. Anyway, what specifically do you need help with?

comments.author: FatFork
comments.body: Quote from: work2019 on June 21, 2022, 09:46:19 AMhello . good morning . i need help in blockchain wallet . anybody can help me ? thanks . good byeHello! Please try to give a little more detail about your problem. No one can assist you if you are unable to describe your problem. Thanks.

comments.author: Plaguedeath
comments.body: If your balance doesn't shown up, it's just because they're full of bug.If you want to recover your old wallet and you missing few words, brute force is the way to do.That's my guess of your problem since most of people faced this.
